thread.title: NASCAR drivers, fans react to Tony Stewart's retirement announcement
thread.title_full: NASCAR drivers, fans react to Tony Stewart's retirement announcement

author: Nick Schwartz
title: NASCAR drivers, fans react to Tony Stewart's retirement announcement
text:
NASCAR drivers, fans react to Tony Stewart's retirement announcement USA Today Sports 14 hrs ago Nick Schwartz ¬© Provided by USA Today Sports Stewart in 1999. Steve Helber/AP Three-time Sprint Cup Series champion Tony Stewart announced Wednesday that he will retire as a driver after the 2016 season. Stewart, 44, will have raced in NASCAR‚Äôs top series for 18 seasons when he retires next year, with more than 600 starts. Stewart is tied for 13th on NASCAR‚Äôs all-time wins list with 48, the third most of any active driver (behind only Jeff Gordon and Jimmie Johnson). Clint Bowyer will replace Stewart in the No. 14 car in 2017.
Stewart says he still plans to race ‚Äî just not in the Sprint Cup Series. Stewart is a controversial figure, but he‚Äôs unquestionably a NASCAR legend, and his fellow drivers and fans are sad to see him go.
We've had our moments, but its been awesome to race with and against you @TonyStewart pic.twitter.com/E1cn26Y6Wl
‚Äî Joey Logano (@joeylogano) September 30, 2015
Bittersweet listening to one of my biggest heroes make his announcement today. Just stoked to get to race against ya for a year, pal! #smoke
‚Äî Chase Elliott (@chaseelliott) September 30, 2015
@TonyStewart is one of the best drivers ever in all of motorsports. Can drive anything to its limits.
‚Äî Jeff Burton (@JeffBurton) September 30, 2015
It is impossible to fully express what @TonyStewart has meant to motorsports. I look forward to reading what people have to say.
‚Äî Conye (@TheOrangeCone) September 30, 2015
. @TonyStewart has done so much for the world of racing. I'm so happy I got to witness some of his amazing career.
‚Äî Kristen Schneider (@KristenS_Writes) September 30, 2015
Sad to hear @TonyStewart is retiring but glad he will still race and be involved with #NASCAR #ThankYouSmoke
‚Äî Ty (@hatecheaters91) September 30, 2015
@TonyStewart Tony, Sad to see you retire from Sprint Cup after 2016, but thank you for all you have done in racing. #ThankYouSmoke üèÅ
‚Äî 5th FloorSportsCards (@5thFloorCards) September 30, 2015
I am legitimately sad that @TonyStewart is retiring. Gonna miss everything he brought to the track. #thankyousmoke @JedClampett_3
‚Äî jdc48160 (@jdc48160) September 30, 2015
Sad to hear this, but glad he is happy and following his own path. Lots of best wishes and good luck to @TonyStewart https://t.co/20VgV9MjlS
